tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to cross-site scripting (XSS) when rendering `FormNode` components due to insufficient sanitization of the `video` and `iframe` tags. This allows attackers to inject and execute malicious scripts in the affected application.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `n8n-nodes-base` library to the patch version.
